quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: Financial Street Securities Co Ltd, formerly Hengtai Securities Co Ltd is a China-based company engaged in securities brokerage business. The Company operates five segments. Brokerage and Wealth Management segment engages in the trading of stocks, funds, bonds and futures, and providing investment and financing solutions, including sale of financial products and margin financing. Investment Banking segment provides corporate finance services, including financial advisory, equity underwriting and debt underwriting services as well as over-the-counter services to institutional clients. The segment provides services to companies entering into National Equities Exchange and Quotations for share quotation and transfer. Proprietary Trading segment engages in trading of equities, bonds, funds, and derivatives for the Group. Investment Management segment includes businesses on assets management, private equity investments and others. Others segment represents other operations of head office.
